Description: Greenhills Apartments and Townhomes is a community that offers you convenience and comfort. Located in beautiful Montgomery County, close to commuter routes 27, 270, 70, and 495, putting you in close proximity to Washington, D.C. and Baltimore.Greenhills Apartments and Townhomes offers all the comforts of having your own home. Each floor plan comes equipped with a wood-burning fireplace, deck or patio, washer/dryer in each unit, walk-in closets, and gas cooking and heat. Garden style or townhome floor plans give you the flexibility to choose your style of living. Parking is even located right outside your front door.Greenhills Apartments and Townhomes keeps you close to the hustle and bustle of the city but far enough away to create a relaxing country atmosphere, giving you a better quality of life. Go to www.greenhillsapts.com and check us out today!

Description:
Ground floor condo unit with two entrances. One indoor, enclosed covered entrance, and a second entrance via sliding glass door (no steps to walk up or down). 951 sq. feet space. Spacious open living room with separate dining area. Kitchen cabinets recently refurbished and painted. Wood floors throughout living room, dining room, and hallway. New carpeting in both bedrooms. Two full baths; Both bathrooms have a tub and shower, with double sink in hallway bathroom. Kitchen: Oven/range, refrigerator, dishwasher, and garbage disposal. Laundry: new washing machine and dryer located inside the condo. Central Heating and Air Conditioning unit maintenance plan paid for by landlord. Private parking lot for condo residents. Snow removal services are paid for by the owner. Locked storage closet attached to condo. Wheelchair accessible. Numerous restaurants, gas stations, supermarkets, and various stores all within walking distance. Condo HOA fees covered by landlord (trash, snow removal, landscaping). Tenant responsible for cable/internet, electric, and phone. Additional $25 per month fee for pet(s).
Rent due at beginning of month. First months rent, and one month security deposit due at lease signing.

FR with wood burning FP. 1st Floor Master suite with walk-in closet and deck. 3 Additional upper bedrooms with full bath. Laundry room with full size washer and dryer. Powder room off laundry room. Generous amount of parking... Call today for a showiing.

Description: Great 2 bedroom 1 large full bath with dual sinks. 2nd floor unit backing to woods. New carpet through out. Kitchen with breakfast bar and pantry. Large great room area. Master BR with huge walk in closet. Storage closet on deck. No pets or smokers allowed. minimum 600 credit and 49k per year income.

Lovely 4 bedroom 2 bath all brick home on a 1/2 acre in Damascus. This home has 3 bedrooms and one full bath on main level and has separate suite in the basement. The home is located on 1/2 acre lot and has NO HOA restrictions. This home is currently available for move in shortly after Oct. 1. New flooring is being installed Oct 4th. Please call Brian Roth for showing instructions. Thank You

Description:
(240) 403-0400 - - Freshly painted with new laminate flooring & carpet. Spacious kitchen with breakfast bar, formal dining. Main bedroom with walk in closet. Finished lower level with recreation area, full bath with soaking tub. Level walk out to fenced in yard. Two reserved parking spaces right in front. Great community with playground, trails. Outstanding public schools. Move in ready.
No Pets Allowed
(RLNE3461653) Other Amenities - Other- attic - access only, shades / blinds. Pet policies - No Dogs Allowed, No Cats Allowed.

Description: Damascus Gardens is a small, affordable community with family living in mind. These 1, 2, and 3 bedroom apartments are located in Damascus, Maryland, just off of Route 108 in Montgomery County- with a bus stop around the corner. We're close to the city, but you'll feel like you're living in the country. Federally subsidized community - please call for availability and rents.
